cause.description:
Religion is a bunch of sadistic, delusional bullshit that is warping the minds of millions of adults and children world wide. Just think of all the holy wars and fucked up causes being promoted by religion (ie. creationism in science classes and banning abortion) its such a bunch of bullshit.
1. Atheism is the only ration belief system tbh!
2. God doesnt exist
3. Religion is stupid, delusional bullshit
cause.mission: Abolish all faith in a divine power
cause.name: Religion Is Evil Bullcrap :D
